name: MAGNESIUM TRISILICATE
cautions:
Cautions 
(From 1.1.1 Antacids and simeticone: British National Formulary)
Magnesium-containing antacids tend to be laxative; interactions: Appendix 1 (antacids)
side-effects:
Side-effects diarrhoea, belching due to liberated carbon dioxide;
silica-based renal stones reported on long-term treatment
